alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward County through 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parkland, or over Coral Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Tamarac, Margate, Coconut Creek, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Godfrey Road, Hillsboro Pines, Ramblewood East, Hillsboro Ranches and Sandalfoot Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County
